name: metrics_sample
description: Metric data periodically sampled by the application.

reason.description: Reason the metrics snapshot was sampled.

slot.description: If the reason the sample was taken is because a leader was starting or ending, this is the slot that was starting (or ending). If a leader slot is both ending and starting (leader_end_start), this is the slot which is starting.

tile.description: Common metrics shared by all tiles

kind_id.description: ID of the tile within the type.

context_switch_involuntary_count.description: The number of involuntary context switches.

context_switch_voluntary_count.description: The number of voluntary context switches.

status.description: The current status of the tile. 0 is booting, 1 is running.

heartbeat.description: The last UNIX timestamp in nanoseconds that the tile heartbeated.

in_backpressure.description: Whether the tile is currently backpressured or not, either 1 or 0.

backpressure_count.description: Number of times the times the tile has had to wait for one of more consumers to catch up to resume publishing.

regime_duration_nanos.description: Mutually exclusive and exhaustive duration of time the tile spent in each of the regimes.

kind_id.description: ID of the tile within the type.

link_kind_id.description: ID of the link within the link kind.

consumed_count.description: The number of times the link reader has consumed a fragment.

consumed_size_bytes.description: The total number of bytes read by the link consumer.

filtered_count.description: The number of fragments that were filtered and not consumed.

filtered_size_bytes.description: The total number of bytes read by the link consumer that were filtered.

overrun_polling_count.description: The number of times the link has been overrun while polling.

overrun_polling_frag_count.description: The number of fragments the link has not processed because it was overrun while polling.

overrun_reading_count.description: The number of input overruns detected while reading metadata by the consumer.

overrun_reading_frag_count.description: The number of fragments the link has not processed because it was overrun while reading.

slow_count.description: The number of times the consumer was detected as rate limiting consumer by the producer.

received_bytes.description: Total bytes received (including IP, UDP headers).

sent_bytes.description: Total bytes sent (including IP, UDP headers).

xdp_rx_dropped_ring_full.description: Number of packets dropped because the RX completion queue was empty. This is only reported for net tile 0, since the measurement is across all RX queues.

xdp_rx_dropped_other.description: Number of packets dropped for other reasons. This is only reported for net tile 0, since the measurement is across all RX queues.

tx_dropped.description: Number of packets dropped because the TX submission queue was empty. This is reported for all net tiles.

txns_overrun.description: Count of txns overrun before reassembled (too small txn_reassembly_count).

txn_reasms_started.description: Count of fragmented txn receive ops started.

txn_reasms_active.description: Number of fragmented txn receive ops currently active.

frags_gap.description: Count of txn frags dropped due to data gap

frags_dup.description: Count of txn frags dropped due to dup (stream already completed)

txns_received.description: Count of txns received via TPU.

txns_abandoned.description: Count of txns abandoned because a conn was lost.

quic_packet_too_small.description: Count of packets received on the QUIC port that were too small to be a valid IP packet.

quic_txn_too_small.description: Count of txns received via QUIC dropped because they were too small.

quic_txn_too_large.description: Count of txns received via QUIC dropped because they were too large.

non_quic_packet_too_small.description: Count of packets received on the non-QUIC port that were too small to be a valid IP packet.

non_quic_packet_too_large.description: Count of packets received on the non-QUIC port that were too large to be a valid transaction.

received_bytes.description: Total bytes received (including IP, UDP, QUIC headers).

sent_bytes.description: Total bytes sent (including IP, UDP, QUIC headers).

connections_active.description: The number of currently active QUIC connections.

connections_created.description: The total number of connections that have been created.

connections_retried.description: Number of connections established with retry.

connection_error_no_slots.description: Number of connections that failed to create due to lack of slots.

connection_error_retry_fail.description: Number of connections that failed during retry (e.g. invalid token).

pkt_crypto_failed.description: Number of packets that failed decryption.

pkt_no_conn.description: Number of packets with an unknown connection ID.

pkt_tx_alloc_fail.description: Number of packets failed to send because of metadata alloc fail.

handshake_error_alloc_fail.description: Number of handshakes dropped due to alloc fail.

frame_fail_parse.description: Number of QUIC frames failed to parse.

transaction_parse_failure.description: Count of transactions that failed to parse

transaction_dedup_failure.description: Count of transactions that failed to deduplicate in the verify stage

transaction_verify_failure.description: Count of transactions that failed to deduplicate in the verify stage

transaction_dedup_failure.description: Count of transactions that failed to deduplicate in the dedup stage

gossiped_votes_received.description: Count of simple vote transactions received over gossip instead of via the normal TPU path

no_bank_drop.description: Count of transactions dropped because the bank was not available

lut_resolved.description: Count of address lookup tables resolved

invalid_lookup_index.description: The transaction referenced an index in a LUT that didn't exist

account_uninitialized.description: The account referenced as a LUT hasn't been initialized

invalid_account_data.description: The account referenced as a LUT couldn't be parsed

invalid_account_owner.description: The account referenced as a LUT wasn't owned by the ALUT program ID

account_not_found.description: The account referenced as a LUT couldn't be found

blockhash_expired.description: Count of transactions that failed to resolve because the blockhash was expired

blockhash_unknown.description: Count of transactions with an unknown blockhash. These may be very recent, very old, nonces, or bogus.

normal_transaction_received.description: Count of transactions received via the normal TPU path

transaction_inserted.description: Result of inserting a transaction into the pack object

bundle_blacklist.description: Transaction uses an account on the bundle blacklist

write_sysvar.description: Transaction tries to write to a sysvar

estimation_fail.description: Estimating compute cost and/or fee failed

duplicate_account.description: Transaction included an account address twice

too_many_accounts.description: Transaction tried to load too many accounts

addr_lut.description: Transaction loaded accounts from a lookup table

unaffordable.description: Fee payer's balance below transaction fee

duplicate.description: Pack aware of transaction with same signature

priority.description: Transaction's fee was too low given its compute unit requirement and other competing transactions

nonvote_add.description: Transaction that was not a simple vote added to pending transactions

vote_add.description: Simple vote transaction was added to pending transactions

nonvote_replace.description: Transaction that was not a simple vote replaced a lower priority transaction

vote_replace.description: Simple vote transaction replaced a lower priority transaction

metric_timing.description: Time in nanos spent in each state

no_txn_no_bank_no_leader_no_microblock.description: Pack had no transactions available, and wasn't leader

txn_no_bank_no_leader_no_microblock.description: Pack had transactions available, but wasn't leader or had hit a limit

no_txn_bank_no_leader_no_microblock.description: Pack had no transactions available, had banks but wasn't leader

txn_bank_no_leader_no_microblock.description: Pack had transactions available, had banks but wasn't leader

no_txn_no_bank_leader_no_microblock.description: Pack had no transactions available, and was leader but had no available banks

txn_no_bank_leader_no_microblock.description: Pack had transactions available, was leader, but had no available banks

no_txn_bank_leader_no_microblock.description: Pack had available banks but no transactions

txn_bank_leader_no_microblock.description: Pack had banks and transactions available but couldn't schedule anything non-conflicting

no_txn_no_bank_no_leader_microblock.description: Pack scheduled a non-empty microblock while not leader

txn_no_bank_no_leader_microblock.description: Pack scheduled a non-empty microblock while not leader

no_txn_bank_no_leader_microblock.description: Pack scheduled a non-empty microblock while not leader

txn_bank_no_leader_microblock.description: Pack scheduled a non-empty microblock while not leader

no_txn_no_bank_leader_microblock.description: Pack scheduled a non-empty microblock but all banks were busy

txn_no_bank_leader_microblock.description: Pack scheduled a non-empty microblock but all banks were busy

no_txn_bank_leader_microblock.description: Pack scheduled a non-empty microblock and now has no transactions

transaction_dropped_from_extra.description: Transactions dropped from the extra transaction storage because it was full

transaction_inserted_to_extra.description: Transactions inserted into the extra transaction storage because pack's primary storage was full

transaction_inserted_from_extra.description: Transactions pulled from the extra transaction storage and inserted into pack's primary storage

transaction_expired.description: Transactions deleted from pack because their TTL expired

available_transactions.description: The total number of pending transactions in pack's pool that are available to be scheduled

available_vote_transactions.description: The number of pending simple vote transactions in pack's pool that are available to be scheduled

pending_transactions_heap_size.description: The maximum number of pending transactions that pack can consider.  This value is fixed at Firedancer startup but is a useful reference for AvailableTransactions and AvailableVoteTransactions.

conflicting_transactions.description: The number of available transactions that are temporarily not being considered due to account lock conflicts with many higher paying transactions

smallest_pending_transaction.description: A lower bound on the smallest non-vote transaction (in cost units) that is immediately available for scheduling

microblock_per_block_limit.description: The number of times pack did not pack a microblock because the limit on microblocks/block had been reached

data_per_block_limit.description: The number of times pack did not pack a microblock because it reached reached the data per block limit at the start of trying to schedule a microblock

transaction_schedule.description: Result of trying to consider a transaction for scheduling

taken.description: Pack included the transaction in the microblock

cu_limit.description: Pack skipped the transaction because it would have exceeded the block CU limit

fast_path.description: Pack skipped the transaction because of account conflicts using the fast bitvector check

byte_limit.description: Pack skipped the transaction because it would have exceeded the block data size limit

write_cost.description: Pack skipped the transaction because it would have caused a writable account to exceed the per-account block write cost limit

slow_path.description: Pack skipped the transaction because of account conflicts using the full slow check

cus_consumed_in_block.description: The number of cost units consumed in the current block, or 0 if pack is not currently packing a block

delete_missed.description: Count of attempts to delete a transaction that wasn't found

delete_hit.description: Count of attempts to delete a transaction that was found and deleted

transaction_sanitize_failure.description: Number of transactions that failed to sanitize.

transaction_not_executed_failure.description: Number of transactions that did not execute. This is different than transactions which fail to execute, which make it onto the chain.

precompile_verify_failure.description: Number of transactions that failed precompile verification and thus will not execute.

transaction_load_address_tables.description: Result of loading address lookup tables for a transaction. If there are multiple errors for the transaction, only the first one is reported.

slot_hashes_sysvar_not_found.description: The slot hashes syvar could not be found.

account_not_found.description: The account storing the address lookup table was deactivated or could not be found.

invalid_account_owner.description: The account that owns the referenced lookup table is not the address lookup table program.

invalid_account_data.description: The data for the referenced address lookup table is malformed.

invalid_index.description: The referenced index in the address lookup table does not exist.

transaction_result.description: Result of loading and executing a transaction.

account_in_use.description: An account is already being processed in another transaction in a way that does not support parallelism.

account_loaded_twice.description: A `Pubkey` appears twice in the transaction's `account_keys`.  Instructions can reference `Pubkey`s more than once but the message must contain a list with no duplicate keys.

account_not_found.description: Attempt to debit an account but found no record of a prior credit.

program_account_not_found.description: Attempt to load a program that does not exist.

insufficient_funds_for_fee.description: The fee payer `Pubkey` does not have sufficient balance to pay the fee to schedule the transaction.

invalid_account_for_fee.description: This account may not be used to pay transaction fees.

already_processed.description: The bank has seen this transaction before. This can occur under normal operation when a UDP packet is duplicated, as a user error from a client not updating its `recent_blockhash`, or as a double-spend attack.

blockhash_not_found.description: The bank has not seen the given `recent_blockhash` or the transaction is too old and the `recent_blockhash` has been discarded.

instruction_error.description: An error occurred while processing an instruction.

call_chain_too_deep.description: Loader call chain is too deep.

missing_signature_for_fee.description: Transaction requires a fee but has no signature present.

invalid_account_index.description: Transaction contains an invalid account reference.

signature_failure.description: Transaction did not pass signature verification.

invalid_program_for_execution.description: This program may not be used for executing instructions.

sanitize_failure.description: Transaction failed to sanitize accounts offsets correctly implies that account locks are not taken for this TX, and should not be unlocked.

cluster_maintenance.description: Transactions are currently disabled due to cluster maintenance.

account_borrow_outstanding.description: Transaction processing left an account with an outstanding borrowed reference.

would_exceed_max_block_cost_limit.description: Transaction would exceed max Block Cost Limit.

invalid_writable_account.description: Transaction loads a writable account that cannot be written.

would_exceed_max_account_cost_limit.description: Transaction would exceed max account limit within the block.

would_exceed_account_data_block_limit.description: Transaction would exceed account data limit within the block.

invalid_address_lookup_table_owner.description: Attempted to lookup addresses from an account owned by the wrong program.

invalid_address_lookup_table_data.description: Attempted to lookup addresses from an invalid account.

invalid_address_lookup_table_index.description: Address table lookup uses an invalid index.

invalid_rent_paying_account.description: Transaction leaves an account with a lower balance than rent-exempt minimum.

would_exceed_max_vote_cost_limit.description: Transaction would exceed max Vote Cost Limit.

would_exceed_account_data_total_limit.description: Transaction would exceed total account data limit.

duplicate_instruction.description: Transaction contains a duplicate instruction that is not allowed.

insufficient_funds_for_rent.description: Transaction results in an account with insufficient funds for rent.

max_loaded_accounts_data_size_exceeded.description: Transaction exceeded max loaded accounts data size cap.

invalid_loaded_accounts_data_size_limit.description: LoadedAccountsDataSizeLimit set for transaction must be greater than 0.

resanitization_needed.description: Sanitized transaction differed before/after feature activiation. Needs to be resanitized.

program_execution_temporarily_restricted.description: Program execution is temporarily restricted on an account.

unbalanced_transaction.description: The total balance before the transaction does not equal the total balance after the transaction.

program_cache_hit_max_limit.description: The total program cache size hit the maximum allowed limit.

processing_failed.description: Count of transactions for which the processing stage failed and won't land on chain

fee_only_transactions.description: Count of transactions that will land on chain but without executing

executed_failed_transactions.description: Count of transactions that execute on chain but failed

successful_transactions.description: Count of transactions that execute on chain and succeed

cost_model_undercount.description: Count of transactions that used more CUs than the cost model should have permitted them to

microblocks_abandoned.description: The number of microblocks that were abandoned because we switched slots without finishing the current slot

shred_processed.description: The result of processing a thread from the network

bad_slot.description: Shred was for a slot for which we don't know the leader

rejected.description: Shred was invalid for one of many reasons

ignored.description: Shred was ignored because we had already received or reconstructed it

okay.description: Shred accepted to an incomplete FEC set

completes.description: Shred accepted and resulted in a valid, complete FEC set

fec_set_spilled.description: The number of FEC sets that were spilled because they didn't complete in time and we needed space

shred_rejected_initial.description: The number shreds that were rejected before any resources were allocated for the FEC set

fec_rejected_fatal.description: The number of FEC sets that were rejected for reasons that cause the whole FEC set to become invalid

transactions_inserted.description: Count of transactions produced while we were leader in the shreds that have been inserted so far
